data.title: David Glenn Buckner Obituary 2023
data.meta_description: David Glenn Buckner          Age: 51 Of:  Charlotte, Tennessee      Passed Away: Friday, August 25, 2023, at TriStar Horizon Medical Center in Dickson, Tennessee. David was born...
data.text:
David Glenn Buckner Age: 51

Of: Charlotte, Tennessee Passed Away: Friday, August 25, 2023, at TriStar Horizon Medical Center in Dickson, Tennessee. David was born March 21, 1972, in Nashville, Tennessee, to Donald Ray and Opel Gennett Garrett Buckner. He enjoyed riding his motorcycle, fishing, and playing pool. He was a former HVAC Technician for Merriam Farr Company.

Mr. Bucknerâ€™s wishes were to be cremated.

A Memorial Service for Mr. David Glenn Buckner will be conducted at 2:00 pm Sunday, September 10, at Faith is the Victory Church located at 3344 Walton Lane, Nashville, TN 37216. Pastor Jason Cowan will officiate.

Survived by:

Mother:

Opel G. Towne of Charlotte, TN

Aunts:

Joann Marvel of Goodlettsville, TN

Patsy Powell (Donald) of White House, TN

Judy Henry (Gene) of Monterey, TN

Uncle:

Benny Buckner of Monterey, TN

Preceded in death by:

Father: Donald Buckner

Brother: Terry Buckner

Stepfather: David Towne
